ISSUE.TITLE: Feature Request: add volume.fix.replication arguments
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi Chris, because when running volume.fix.replication all missing volumes are been copied (multi TB operation usually) really can't run it on a cronjob, immediately as one volume server is down, we start copying all data to other volume servers can we at least add a -collection parameter so we can choose which collection MUST be always replicated, same as in volume.balance nice to have: -collectionRegEx so we can use regEx to match multiple collections. Regards.
